languages.text:
This creature receives {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and an additional {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}.
Can cast, when creature's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is equal or less than 80% of it's maximum.

traits.locale_text:
This creature receives {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and an additional {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}.
Can cast, when creature's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is equal or less than 80% of it's maximum.

languages.text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Это существо получает дополнительные {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и может совершать +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}атаку в ход{/g} до конца боя. Не суммируется.
Способность может использоваться, если {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} существа опустилось ниже 80% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального{/g}.

traits.locale_text:

Can be used if the creature's wounds drop below 80% of its maximum wounds.

languages.text:
Diese Kreatur erhält bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Zug{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
Kann verwendet werden, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} der Kreatur unter 80 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} sinken.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Kreatur erhält bis zum Ende des Kampfes zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}Angriff pro Zug{/g}. Nicht stapelbar.
Kann verwendet werden, wenn die Wunden der Kreatur unter 80 % ihrer maximalen Wunden sinken.

languages.text:
Cette créature gagne des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
Peut être utilisé si la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de la créature tombe en dessous de 80 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cette créature gagne des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires et +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attaque par tour{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
Peut être utilisé si la réserve de blessures de la créature tombe en dessous de 80 % de ses blessures maximum.

languages.text:
此生物获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合可额外攻击一次{/g}。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
此能力只有当{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于80%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}时才能使用。
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
此生物获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}每回合可额外攻击一次{/g}。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
此能力只有当生命值低于80%最大生命值时才能使用。

languages.text:
La criatura gana {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataque por turno{/g} hasta el final del turno. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Se puede usar si las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de la criatura bajan del 80 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La criatura gana {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicionales y +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ataque por turno{/g} hasta el final del turno. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
Se puede usar si las heridas de la criatura bajan del 80 % de sus heridas máximas.

languages.text:
この生物は、戦闘終了まで追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターン毎の攻撃回数{/g}+1を付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の80%を下回ると使用できる。
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
この生物は、戦闘終了まで追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターン毎の攻撃回数{/g}+1を付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
生物の傷がその最大の傷の80%を下回ると使用できる。

この生物は、戦闘終了まで追加の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を付与され、{g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}ターン毎の攻撃回数{/g}+1を付与される。この効果はスタックしない。
生物の傷がその最大の傷の80%を下回ると使用できる。

languages.text:
Bu yaratık, ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %80'inin altına indiğinde kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
This creature gains additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.
Can be used if the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 80% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Bu yaratık, ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının %80'inin altına indiğinde kullanılabilir.

Bu yaratık, ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}tur başına saldırı{/g} kazanır. Bu etki çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
Yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g}, maksimum sağlık puanının %80'inin altına indiğinde kullanılabilir.
